verbs.description: Gina Haspel [V: was] confirmed Thursday to be the first female director of the CIA with the help of votes from a half - dozen Senate Democrats . Haspel was confirmed in a 54 - 45 vote , the culmination of a roller - coaster nomination that appeared to be in danger at several points after she was abruptly selected by President Donald Trump in March .
